oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. A.D. Albright letter, February 19, 1913.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A.D. Albright, Representative from Knoxville, House of Representatives, State of Tennessee, Nashville, letter to Mrs. L. Crozier French, Knoxville, Tenn. February 19, 1913. Supports bill removing the disabilities of married women and will consider a bill to make women eligible for juvenile judgeships.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Politicians; Women's rights; Correspondence; Politics & government;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: A.D. Albright
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
